page.title: 01General impression of area
page.content: The area to the{north}is bounded by the River Tay.The majority of the area consists of cultivated crops,grazing land,coniferous and deciduous woods and bracken.The centre of population is concentrated in the{south}in the village of Gauldry.There are also small communities to the north at Bottomcraig and Kirkton of Balmerino and to the{east}several houses in Kilmany Road in Wormit.The focal point in the area is Naughton House _ home of Brigadier Crawford who owns Naughton Estate which encompassess most of the area.
